title: “How can we minimise the use of regular oral corticosteroids in asthma?” Arnaud Bourdin, Ian Adcock, Patrick Berger, Philippe Bonniaud, Philippe Chanson, Cécile Chenivesse, Jacques de Blic, Antoine Deschildre, Philippe Devillier, Gilles Devouassoux, Alain Didier, Gilles Garcia, Antoine Magnan, Yan Martinat, Thierry Perez, Nicolas Roche, Camille Taillé, Pierre Val and Pascal Chanez. Eur Respir Rev 2020; 29: 190085.
